assessment_item.subject: Social Studies
assessment_item.title: ಕೂಲಿರಹಿತ ದುಡಿಮೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿರುವ ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಕೂಲಿರಹಿತ ದುಡಿಮೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿರುವ ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಕಾರ್ಖಾನೆಗಳನ್ನು ಕಾರ್ಮಿಕನಾಗಿ ದುಡಿಯುವುದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8311"},{"text":"

 ಕೃಷಿಕಾರ್ಮಿಕನಾಗಿ ಕೆಲಸ ಮಾಡುವುದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8312"},{"text":"

ವಿಮಾಕಂಪೆನಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆಲಸ ಮಾಡುವುದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8322"},{"text":"

ಚಿತ್ರಕಾರನು ಆತ್ಮ ಸಂತೋಷಕ್ಕಾಗಿ ಚಿತ್ರ ರಚಿಸುವುದು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:8327"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಕೂಲಿರಹಿತ ದುಡಿಮೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿರುವ ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ ","title":"ಕೂಲಿರಹಿತ ದುಡಿಮೆಗೆ ಉದಾಹರಣೆಯಾಗಿರುವ ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
